input.sentences: my new wife looks so beautiful !
our little flower girl and ring bearer !
my wife and i are finally married !
my sister in law the maid of honor .
time to dance everyone is having so much fun !
output.sentences: Ashley was overwhelmed with emotions as her father walked her down the aisle.
They were followed closely by her niece and nephew.
The DJ introduces, for the first time, Mr. and Mrs. Robert and Ashley Smith.
Ashley's sister, Rose, is very excited for her little sister as she has been planning this day since she was five.
Ashley dances the night away with her friends and family, stepping into a life of holy matrimony.
